resource.name: Permitting Dashboard Full Dataset
resource.description: This dataset contains all milestone information entered by Federal agencies into the Permitting Dashboard. Rows represent single milestones within an individual environmental review or authorization (action). For a full description of all fields in the dataset, see the Data Dictionary. Questions specific to the dataset can be directed to the email listed below. For questions on specific projects, please use the contact information listed on the project page on the The Permitting Dashboard.
columns_name: Environmental and Community Outcomes Applicable Changes
Milestone Current Target Date Value within 31 to 60 Days
columns_description: Type of project within the sector

Unique numerical identifier of a permitting action
Unique numerical identifier of a permitting action milestone
Name of the project
Name of the lead agency of the project
Name of the lead agency bureau of the project
Primary location county of the project
Primary location zipcode of the project
Primary location latitude and longtitude
Primary location latitude
Primary location longitude
Indicator of the type of permitting action
Current status of the permitting action
Agency responsible for the permitting action
Single record to identify distinct project action records
Additional details on the action
Current status of the permitting action
Indicates whether the agency declined to participate
Type of action milestone
Indicates any dependency that a milestone is tied to within the project
Current status of the project
Sector the project belongs to
Short description of milestone
Indicator of whether this milestone is not applicable

Actual date the milestone was completed
Initial date the milestone was planned to be completed

Primary location information in a single field
Single record to identify distinct project records
